'''Ring of Raining Blades - Part I''' is one possible quest item from the [[commission]] "[[Cliffhanger]]," only obtainable if [[Gentry Maocai]] was one of the two NPCs selected for the iteration of the commission. The follow-up is [[Ring of Raining Blades (II)]].

Submitting this item to [[Tea Master Liu Su]] determines the story he tells during the commission.
